attributes.action: GIVE US A VOTE TO COME OUT THE EU AND STAND UP FOR THE TPD BAN
attributes.additional_details: the ue is costing England millions of pounds and what do we get in return?? we all need to make a stand as a nation to make our country ours again because at the moment we are being told what to do when to do it and its not right, also to stand up against the eu laws on the tpd ban that is being forced on to us by the eu the vaping community are strong and most are ex smokers, I believe that the government are worried that the tax being lost by people giving up smoking and turning to vaping
attributes.background: to stand up for the right for a vote out the eu and also stand up against the tpd ban that the eu want to impose on people who vape
